title: PVP.net Patcher Kernal Stopped Working
body: Trying to play a couple of games this morning, and when I opened my desktop shortcut, my client wouldn't open. Instead, I received a notice that stated "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available." Has anyone encountered this problem before? I tried restarting my computer and entering the game through other areas not on my desktop. Thanks!

replies.body: The patcher needs permission from your OS in order to launch or scan files.  Otherwise, you may end up with this kernal error!  We can get this fixed up and allow access by going over a series of steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  That should get you fixed up!

That should get you fixed up!

Thank you! My windows was updated, but my UAC was on. I disabled it, but once that didn't help I moved to the next step. When I ran the game as administrator, it launched properly and I was in.
Update: I tried removing and downloading the game again, which went cleanly. However, when I tried to open to open the game again, the same pop-up appeared.
